mapper.select: select d.movietime,d.cart_num,s.capacity, m.name, m.age, d.sang_num, d.seat from demovie d, sang s, movie m where d.movie_num=#{moviename} and d.theater_num=#{theater} and d.sang_num=s.num and d.movie_num=m.num order by d.movietime
mapper.update: UPDATE demovie SET seat=concat(seat,#{seat}) WHERE cart_num = #{cart_num}
